name: Singara Gonzales
home.description: I'm a Software developer based on Lima, Peru with +4 years of experience programming web systems.
about.me.description.1: I'm a web developer specialized in MEAN and MERN. I work in data management systems, which are focused on increasing the productivity of companies and user satisfaction.
about.me.description.2: I consider myself a responsible person, with initiative and the ability to work in a team, in order to achieve the proposed objectives in the short and long term.
